description.en: Dealt with the varying history eras perceptions about the individuality, body, time, space, movement and dance through practical co-creation processes.
description.et: Tegeletakse erinevate ajastuste arusaamadega individuaalsusest, kehast, ajast, ruumist, liikumisest ja tantsust läbi praktilise ühisloomeprotsessi.

objectives.en: Learn to utilise dance history as a resource in the creation of performance.
Broaden the understanding of different history eras across time, space, bodies and movement in general through co-process of performance.
objectives.et: Avada erinevate ajalooliste  ajastute arusaamist  ajast, ruumist, kehast ja liikumisest üldisemalt läbi  lavastuse ühisloomeprotsessi.

objectives.en: Learn to "see" the body as a socio-cultural influenced melting point.
objectives.et: Õppida "nägema"  keha sotsiaal kultuuriliste mõjutuste ristumispaigana.

learning_outcomes.en: Able to "see" the body as a socio-cultural influenced melting point and thus taking into account in their own creation.
learning_outcomes.et: Oskab  "näha " keha sotsiaal kultuuriliste mõjutuste ristumispaigana ning  arvestada selle teadmisega  oma loomingus.

learning_outcomes.en: Able to use dance history as a resource in their own creation.
learning_outcomes.et: Oskab kasutada tantsuajalugu ressursina oma loomingus.
